name: chillhop-radio
description: An (unofficial) native MacOS App for Chillhop Radio.

scripts.installsupport: echo 'Run: [brew install graphicsmagick imagemagick] for additional DMG support.'
scripts.dist: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/ && ./node_modules/.bin/create-dmg './build/Chillhop Radio-darwin-x64/Chillhop Radio.app' --overwrite --dmg-title='Chillhop Radio' --identity='Aubrey Portwood' ./dist

author: Aubrey Portwood
